item.title: Noise pollution, 20th July
item.description:
Bass music blasting from people gathering in and around the park from the middle of the day to the early morning. Ridiculous. Inconsiderate. Anxiety-inducing.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Freshfield Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Old play area is now a nuisance, 20th July
item.description:
The play area is being used for loud (music, conversation, shouting) hangouts and bbqs and is becoming an ASBO issue. The bass-filled music is spilling into every home and lasts well into the early mornings. Marquee, speakers, bbq grill is becoming normal.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Freshfield Avenue, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned van, 20th July
item.description:
Van has been parked at the entrance to car park on the right opposite the bushes for the last 6 days

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stanhope Grove, Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please urgently provide new giant metal 3 bins, 20th July
item.description:
On the corner of Watts Street and Kelly Avenue there is a rubbish bin room which is absolutely unacceptably filthy and extremely smelly which is very toxic to our area and needs to be cleaned and disinfected immediately. We cannot open our windows which are just right next to this filthy and disgusting smelling rubbish room full of dirty 100 flies. Please urgently provide disinfecting clean of the rubbish room and please replace the 3 giant metal bins for health and safety of the residents who live right next to this rubbish room.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29; 31, Kelly Avenue, Peckham, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sink hole badly fixed still sinking and now bigger than originally was, 20th July
item.description:
The sink hole that was 'fixed' a few weeks back was badly done and now vehicles are damaging exhaust pipes and bumpers by the repair surface being lower than the rest of the road surface and sink hole has continued to sink as there was no reinforcement put below hole to stop it from continuing to sink therefore,creating an even bigger sinkhole in the road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 89, Southlands Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrowth and rubbish, 20th July
item.description:
The weeds and plants from the communal area of 12-18 are spilling out into the walkway which hits people as they pass. There is also rubbish which has been put on the pathway by tenants.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tickford Close, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
